html: (2 Nephi 18:6)."Rejoice in Rezin and Remaliah's son." As noted in Isaiah 7, Rezin was the king of Syria and the son of Remaliah was Pekah, king of Ephraim or the northern kingdom of Israel. The word "rejoice" is somewhat puzzling. This may be a reference to possible rejoicing of the Judeans when Syria and Ephraim are attacked by the Assyrians. However, as noted in the commentary on the next two verses, Judah will also be overrun by the same invading forces.
